Package com.fortisbank.data.file

Class TransactionRepositoryFile

java.lang.Object
com.fortisbank.data.file.FileRepository<Transaction>
com.fortisbank.data.file.TransactionRepositoryFile
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITransactionRepository
public class TransactionRepositoryFile extends FileRepository<Transaction> implements ITransactionRepository
Repository class for managing transactions in a file. Implements the ITransactionRepository interface.
